About Me

Hi, I am Avi Tavdish.
I am a Computer Science (B.Sc.) Student at HIT - Holon Institute of Technology. Currently on my 3rd yrear and suppose to gradute in october. I am also known for being a really good team player and leader, with excellent interpersonal skills. Looking for a Student Software engineer position.
